duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver on strategies that support website content, on-page, technical, crawlability, and UX.
Conduct keyword and topic research analysis.
Develop and execute link building and backlink strategy.
Create editorial plans for the blog and website to increase organic traffic.
Ensure that all listings on the search engines have the right messaging being pulled from our site content.
Perform continuous auditing, identify and recommend areas for improvement within site structure, page templates and redirects.
Author and present performance reports to the marketing team.
Stay up to date on SEO best practices, including algorithm updates, standard methodologies, emerging trends, and competitor techniques.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
